Entries.give_flowersA: Oh!....For me?!$8#$b#I had no idea you had these feelings for me.$8#$b#...I guess this means I'm your girlfriend now.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: You wish to date me?  After how I treated you at first?$8#$b#...$7#$b#Yes... I would be more than happy to be your girlfriend.$4
Entries.give_pendant: ...!$8#$b#This pendant... that means....$8#$b#Oh @!  Yes! Of course I will marry you!$4#$b#I feel like a princess right now.  I am so happy!$1#$b#I will talk to the Mayor!  Don't worry dear, it shouldn't take more than three days to get everything ready.$1#$b#I can't believe I am about to be a bride!!$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: My sweet @, you have always been so good to me.$4#$b#I thought that this stardrop would be a wonderful way to show my affection and gratitude.$1#$b#Thank you so much, my sweet husband.$4^Thank you so much, my sweet wife.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: What? Eww.. no way.$3
Entries.rejectNPCB: You really think I would be interested in you?$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: *sigh*...$7#$b#Look... @, was it?  I appreciate that you have those feelings.  But you don't know me and I don't know you enough.$7
Entries.reject_two_heartB: I really don't think it's a good idea, @.$7#$b#You're still kinda new and I don't even know much about you.$7
Entries.reject_four_heartA: ...!$8#$b#Oh my... my heart skipped a beat...$4#$b#...I just don't feel ready though, I'm sorry.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh... I mean.. well...$8#$b#I think we should just be friends.$2
Entries.engageA: What?  But you are spoken for already...$8#$b#Let's pretend this never happened.$7
Entries.engageB: But you're going to get married... I hope you're not planning to cheat on your future spouse.$4
Entries.marriedA: Where did you get this?$8#$b#You know that %spouse would be devastated if you handed me this...
Entries.marriedB: .....$7#$b#If you're serious about this sort of thing... you should divorce %spouse.$7#$b#I don't want to be a home-wrecker.$2
Entries.refusal_knownA: What?$8#$b#I'm sorry, @.  I don't think I am ready to be married.$2
Entries.refusal_knownB: What's this for?$8#$b#@, I think you're ok and all... but I am not looking to get married to you.$1
Entries.refusal_botherA: It's still a No, @.  Don't make me mad.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: What?! Why?!$8#$b#I'm not even attracted to you.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Why would I marry someone I just met?$3#$b#You're not even my type of guy.$3^There's no way I would even be with a girl in any case.$3

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh my, @.  You really know how to spoil me.$1#$b#I appreciate your feelings for me.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I was just thinking about you, @.$1#$b#Thank you for the flowers.  I never felt so loved.$4

Entries.give_flowersB: Wow... with all of these bouquets I can start a florist shop.$1

Entries.engageB: Are these being sold wholesale somewhere?  Or did you get this some other way?
Entries.marriedA: Oh.. but we're already married.$8#$b#I guess our wedding day was an experience I wish I could relive too.$1
Entries.marriedB: Maybe we should give that to our children in the future.#$b#That way they can give it to their loved one.$1

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers!$6#$b#My horoscope was right!!  Yes! Let's take our relationship to the next level.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: @, are these for me?!$6#$b#I had no idea you felt the same as I do.  Of course I will be your girlfriend.$4
Entries.give_pendant: !!$6#$b#I..Is this a dream?!  I want this to be real...$6#$b#...it is real right?!$4#$b#I am so happy!! Let me go run to the Mayor and tell him the good news.  We should be set in about three days.$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: @, everyday with you has been a dream come true.$4#$b#I hope this stardrop will convey that the positive energies you share with me are appreciated.$4#$b#Thank you so much, darling.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: Isn't it a little too soon to declare your feelings?$3
Entries.rejectNPCB: I'm not an 'easy' woman you know.$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: We barely met... it feels a bit creepy to have a guy to do this.$2^We barely met... I'm a bit creeped out getting flowers from a woman so soon.$2
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Oh... are these for me?#$b#...$2#$b#My horoscope warned me of incoming love today... perhaps some other time.$3
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Oh @!$4#$b#Don't get me wrong... I like you... but my heart isn't prepared.  I need to meditate on this.$3
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh.. Well.. I just don't want to ruin the great friendship we have.$1
Entries.engageA: Why are you giving me this?  You are already getting married...$3#$b#Please don't do this..$2
Entries.engageB: This isn't right... I should tell someone.. But I think you will find the right path without the trouble.$3
Entries.marriedA: ...!$6#$b#Why are you so scandalous, @?$6#$b#I don't think %spouse would want to find out you're doing this.$3
Entries.marriedB: I think %spouse deserves better than this behavior, @.$5
Entries.refusal_knownA: Our relationship is very strong... But it's not ready for this.$3
Entries.refusal_knownB: We're just friends, @.  I think you're amazing, but I just don't see you that way.
Entries.refusal_botherA: Didn't you ask me this already?  We can't get married yet...$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Isn't this a little too soon?
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Wow... this is actually a first for me.$1#$b#I am flattered but you just moved here....

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh, Wow!  Everyday is like falling in love with you all over again, @.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: Oh, my darling @, I love you too. < $4
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: How did you find that?$6#$b#I still have the pendant you gave me.$1
Entries.engageB: Oh my!  I wouldn't feel right wearing two of those at once.$1

Entries.give_flowersA: You are such a smoothie, @.$4^You can be such a sweetheart, @$4#$b#I should get a vase and let these flourish as long as they can.
Entries.give_flowersB: @, I am so happy that you appreciate every moment of our marriage.$4
Entries.give_pendant: ...!$8#$b#This pendant... that means....$8#$b#Oh @!  Yes! Of course I will marry you!$4#$b#I feel like a princess right now.  I am so happy!$1#$b#I will talk to the Mayor!  Don't worry dear, it shouldn't take more than three days to get everything ready.$1#$b#I can't believe I am about to be a bride!!$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: My sweet @, you have always been so good to me.$4#$b#I thought that this stardrop would be a wonderful way to show my affection and gratitude.$1#$b#Thank you so much, my sweet husband.$4^Thank you so much, my sweet wife.$4
Entries.marriedA: Oh.. is there such a thing as being 'Double-Married'?$6#$b#I wonder if it would make us double happy?$1
Entries.marriedB: How does someone get a second Mermaid Pendant?#$b#What should we even do with the extra?

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers?$7#$b#Did you buy these from dad and immediately go looking for me?$9#$b#Flowers aren't really my style... but I know what you want, so yes, I will go out with you.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: Aww, how cute.$1#$b#I would've gone with something a bit more... me...$1#$b#...Saying no?  Oh no.. I am saying yes.$1
Entries.give_pendant: !!$7#$b#...$2#$b#I never thought I would go this far with anyone...$2#$b#@... I would be happy and proud to be your wife.$4#$b#I guess I better go tell Mayor Lewis.$1#$b#I know you're busy so I'll handle the wedding, should take three days or so.$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: I have never felt so alive in my whole life, that is until I met you, @.$4#$b#I want you to have this stardrop as a token of what you mean to me.$4#$b#Thank you for everything.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: I don't think we even have anything in common.$3#$b#Go away.$3
Entries.rejectNPCB: Pffff... Nah... I'll pass on that.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartA: You really haven't been around enough for me to even know you.$6#$b#I don't date fast men.$1^I don't date women.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartB: ....$2#$b#Look... @, You're cool and all but I feel an eerie sense to not rush into things.$9
Entries.reject_four_heartA: You have these feelings for me?$7#$b#I admit that I like you, @.$2#$b#I just haven't really thought about it seriously...$2#$b#I didn't even know you were thinking about it seriously.$6
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Why would you want to mess up the good thing we got going?$1#$b#I couldn't do that to a friend like you.$1
Entries.engageA: You're not available... how did you get two pendants anyways?$3
Entries.engageB: I don't think I would feel good about cucking another person.$6#$b#Let's pretend this never happened.
Entries.marriedA: ...!  Are you crazy?!$7#$b#If %spouse heard about this, we'd be in so much trouble!$7
Entries.marriedB: I'm not accepting that unless you divorce %spouse first.$3#$b#It's downright rude to propose to me when you're already married.$3
Entries.refusal_botherA: I already told you no... why are you still asking...$3
Entries.refusal_botherB: Leave me alone... you're starting to piss me off.$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Are you crazy?$8#$b#I don't even like you.$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: What? Are you some creepy stalker or something?$7
Entries.refusal_knownA: I don't think I'm ready for that.$6
Entries.refusal_knownB: You're cool and all, but I think I need to pass for now.$1

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh!  You brought me more flowers.$3#$b#Well, if anything, you're a consistient guy.  Thank you very much.$1^Well, if anything, you're a persistent lady.  Thank you very much.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: I've said this normally not my style, but from you, I can't help but feel loved.$4
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: Did you hit your head in the mines?  You already gave me one.  I said yes..$3
Entries.engageB: D..Deja Vu?$7#$b#Oh.. you are just forgetful... I still have our pendant near me.$1

Entries.give_flowersA: You can't help yourself can you, @?$4#$b#I don't think I ever thought I'd be with a guy that loves me so much.< $4^I never thought a woman would ever love me so faithfully.<$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I know I told you flowers were not my thing, but they sure have grown on me.$1#$b#I'm lucky to have a caring husband.$1^I am lucky to have such a doting wife.$1
Entries.marriedA: Are you finding these at some 'CJB' shop or something?$3
Entries.marriedB: Do you keep that around incase we don't work out or something?$3#$b#I think our marriage is going well.. I hope..$2

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh my..$4#$b#Is this really for me?  Of course we can be more serious, I thought you'd never ask.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: You want us to be more serious?$4#$b#How can I refuse?!  I want this just as much as you do.$1
Entries.give_pendant: Every day I see you, you always say or do something to make my life happier.$2#$b#I feel as if I could never be happier... then you do this...$2#$b#...$2#$b#@, I promise to be a good wife and hopefully a good mother in time.$4#$b#I don't know who to tell first, Mom or the Mayor!$1#$b#We can have our wedding in about three days.. I'm so nervous.$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: @, you given me a life I only dreamed of.$4#$b#I don't think I can ever be more happier than being at your side.$4#$b#Let's celebrate the possibilities of our future.$1
Entries.rejectNPCA: Uhhhm...$2#$b#N..No thank you.$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: Are all men from the city as fast as you?$5^Are all women from the city as fast as you?$5#$b#Or is it just you.$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: You don't even know my hopes and dreams.$2#$b#There's no way I can jump into something like this.$2
Entries.reject_two_heartB: ..... I don't think my mom would approve.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I am very fond of you, @.$4#$b#....$2#$b#...I just don't feel ready to go further yet.$3
Entries.reject_four_heartB: @, I appreciate your honesty about your feelings, but we are just friends.$3
Entries.engageA: I am happy for your engagement, @.$5#$b#But this is unacceptable... don't break the heart of your love so close to your wedding.$5
Entries.engageB: Aren't you getting married.#$b#You shouldn't be doing this behind their back...$3
Entries.marriedA: I read about such scandalous things in books.$3#$b#I don't want %spouse to get hurt from you being a deadbeat husband.$3^I don't want %spouse to get hurt from you being a deadbeat wife.$3
Entries.marriedB: Setting my feelings aside, this is wrong for you and for %spouse.$5
Entries.refusal_knownA: I am enjoying our friendship... but I don't think we're ready for that kind of commitment.$3
Entries.refusal_knownB: I feel we are moving to fast... let's slow it down and enjoy our youth.
Entries.refusal_botherA: Why would I change my answer?  It's still No...$3
Entries.refusal_botherB: You're starting to be annoying... I'm not ready!$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: How can you even ask me to marry you?  I don't even know who you are.$2
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: ... I'm sorry but I feel that you're creepy.$2

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh @, even though we are almost married, you try so hard to make me what I already am.$4#$b#The happiest woman in the world.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: My face is going to get sore with all the love and happiness you make me smile at.$1
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: I love you @, but I can only say yes to marriage once.$4
Entries.engageB: Are you worried I lost the pendant?  I can never lose something so precious.

Entries.give_flowersA: They're beautiful!$1#$b#You're such a loving husband.$4^Just like my wife.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: For me?  Oh @, come closer so I can give you the kiss you deserve.$4
Entries.marriedA: Are you digging these up?  Maybe Gunther might know something about it.$3
Entries.marriedB: It makes me a little nervous that you keep an extra pendant hanging around.$2#$b#I hope you know how much I love you, @.$3

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers?$9#$b#I always thought of this tradition as a quaint gesture... I never thought I'd be offered any.$1#$b#I like this approach... sure let's take our relationship to the next level.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: Hmmmmm.. Dad told me that these particular species of flower are....#$b#What?  They're for me?!$9#$b#Thank you, @.  I am happy to know your true feelings for me.$1#$b#I almost ruined the mood there.$2#$b#Thank you for being patient with me.$4
Entries.give_pendant: ...$4#$b#I have dreamed about this moment all my life.$4#$b#I don't think I could be happier, @.  Yes, let's get married!$4#$b#I'll talk to the Mayor... Mom will probably want to help with the set up as well.  I think it should only take three days.$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: You have been patient and understanding with me.#$b#I hope this stardrop is an acceptable gift to express my gratitude.$4#$b#I think I'm getting better at this whole 'wife' situation... What do you think?$1
Entries.rejectNPCA: Uhhh I don't think this is how it works, @.
Entries.rejectNPCB: I find this highly disrespectful.$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: I'm not the type that jumps for love.$2#$b#Especially if we barely met.#3
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Uhhhh... I hope these are for Dad's research...$1
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Oh, @... I am glad you have these feelings for me.$4#$b#....$2#$b#I just don't think I can return them yet.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Are you trying to brighten my day, @?#$b#You're a good friend.$1
Entries.engageA: I hope you're joking right now, @.$5#$b#You're engaged already and here you are asking me to marry you.$5#$b#You're not a womanizer are you?$5
Entries.engageB: I am not dignifying this... you should be ashamed of yourself asking to marry me when you're already engaged.$5#$b#Maybe you forgot... so I'll let it slide.$3
Entries.marriedA: Where did you even get a second pendant...$9#$b#No I will not marry you... and I'm sure %spouse would flip if this is found out.$5
Entries.marriedB: This kind of man are you?$5^What kind of woman are you?$5#$b#Your spouse is at home and here you are trying to be some sort of deviant.$5
Entries.refusal_knownA: I think things are fine as they are right now... maybe later.$3
Entries.refusal_knownB: Mom warned me about taking relationships too fast... Let's wait a while longer.$9
Entries.refusal_botherA: Oh @, I am just not ready for this commitment.$2
Entries.refusal_botherB: @, you're being stubborn... give me some space.$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: ...$9#$b#We haven't dated, let alone gotten to know each other.$2
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: How are you even going to marry me without actually knowing me.$5

Entries.give_flowersA: We're engaged, and you're still treating me like this?  I feel so special, @!$4
Entries.give_flowersB: Are you trying to butter me up for after the wedding?#$b#I can promise you there's no need.$1
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: The odds of you having two of those are pretty slim.  Perhaps we should talk about the math behind it.$1
Entries.engageB: As much as it would sound good, giving me a second pendant won't count to anything.$3#$b#It is kinda funny to think about how you may of found that.$1#$b#You didn't steal it from one of the married couples did you?$9

Entries.give_flowersA: Are you trying to increase your chance of a longer night?$4#$b#It's working.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: Mom always told me when I found the right man, I'd know.$4^Mom always said finding the right one was special.$4#$b#I am pretty sure that you're the right man.$4^You are so special to me, @.$4
Entries.marriedA: Where did you find this?$9
Entries.marriedB: That better not belong to someone else..$5

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh my... are you sure you want this?$6#$b#I'm sure I do, I just wanted to make sure you were.$1#$b#I am glad our feelings towards each other are growing stronger.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: And here I was carving something up to ask you out.$1#$b#Looks like I got beat to the punch.$1#$b#Either way, I am glad we are finally together.$4
Entries.give_pendant: ...!!$6#$b#Can I really have it all here?$2#$b#You've encouraged my art, been a reliable friend, and even dated me with respect...#$b#I don't think I would be happier being married to anyone else.$4#$b#I will let the Mayor know as soon as possible.  It should take three days to set up our wedding.$1#$b#I'm so excited!  I feel inspired to make a whole new piece.$1
Entries.stardrop_gift: I found this early this morning out in the forest.$1#$b#When I picked it up I thought of you right off the bat.$4#$b#I figured the best person to have it was you.  Thank you for all you've done for me.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: ...$3^Oh so you're.... Like me?$3#$b#Beat it buster, I'm not available.$5^I'm no cheap thrill, lady.  Get away!$5
Entries.rejectNPCB: You are some sort of lecherous pig aren't you.$5^You are some sort of scandalous wench aren't you!$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: My art is far too important right now.$3#$b#Besides, we really don't know each other.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Um... I mean... I got this one project I'm working on....$6
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I really haven't thought about us this deeply.$7#$b#Maybe we should give it a little more time.$3
Entries.reject_four_heartB: I don't think I can accept this from you.$6#$b#We are friends and nothing more.$7
Entries.engageA: What?  But you're engaged!$6#$b#I would never do such a terrible thing.$2
Entries.engageB: Why would you propose to me... you're already spoken for.$3#$b#I hope you didn't regret your decision.$7
Entries.marriedA: I am not even considering this until you're single again.$5
Entries.marriedB: As long as you're married to %spouse, we are just friends.  Get everything else out of your head.$5
Entries.refusal_knownA: After what happened with Kel, I think I want to go nice and slow.$1
Entries.refusal_knownB: I don't think I'm ready to get married yet... I'm sorry..$7
Entries.refusal_botherA: Why are you being persistent?$3#$b#I just want some more time....$2
Entries.refusal_botherB: You're starting to make me feel pressured... cut it out!$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: What?!$6#$b#You just met me practically...$6
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Is this how it goes in the city?  It doesn't go that way here.$7

Entries.give_flowersA: You brought me so much already.$4#$b#I am so happy to be your financee.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: Don't go picking out a whole flowerfield for me.$1#$b#I know you love me... no matter what.$4
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: Where are you finding these pendants, I wonder?$7
Entries.engageB: I wonder if I can use all these extra pendants to decorate a room.$7

Entries.give_flowersA: They're gorgeous, @!$1#$b#Thank you so much. <$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I wonder if anyone else has a husband as loving as you.$4^I wonder if anyone else has a loving wife like you.$4
Entries.marriedA: If you find a few more of these, let me know.  I would love to use some for the base boards.$7
Entries.marriedB: Did you name one of the animals 460 or something?$5

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh.. well I never had a guy give me flowers before$1^You know this is supposed to work the other way around.$1#$b#I guess that means you and I are dating, huh?$4
Entries.give_flowersB: After all we've been through, I suppose this is the next logical step.$1#$b#Let's run to that endzone together then.$4
Entries.give_pendant: ...$7#$b#Here we are then...$2#$b#I won't lie about my feelings of love towards you.  You've always been there for me.$2#$b#Seeing this pendant confirms your feelings towards me.$4#$b#Let's do this... I'll let the mayor know what's up... Should take about three days to get everything set up.$4
Entries.stardrop_gift: You're such a good husband that I had to give you this stardrop.$4^You're such a good wife that I had to give you this stardrop.$4#$b#You filled the void in my heart and I can't thank you enough.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: I am not interested in you.$9
Entries.rejectNPCB: Heh.. You're not even my type.#$b#I don't even look at guys that way.^You have to be far prettier.
Entries.reject_two_heartA: You can't expect a quarterback to trust a rookie split end.#$b#I don't know what you can do yet.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartB: I don't think you and I are a winning team yet.#$b# we are still trying to get to know each other.
Entries.reject_four_heartA: We are definitely a good team.$2#$b#I just don't feel it's time to do the winning play.
Entries.reject_four_heartB: What?  You can't be serious.  You are like my center... I need you where you're at.$1
Entries.engageA: Hang on there, @. You're already engaged with someone.$1#$b#I don't play it that way.
Entries.engageB: I don't think you are being serious... you're already engaged...$5
Entries.marriedA: I'm sure %spouse wouldn't want to know about this.$9#$b#I don't want you to disrespect your marriage.$9
Entries.marriedB: I am flattered... really.$4#$b#But this is wrong.  You're married to %spouse...$2
Entries.refusal_knownA: I don't think we need to be in such a rush... Give it some time.
Entries.refusal_knownB: Hmmm... can you give me more time to think about this?
Entries.refusal_botherA: Stop pestering me about it... I'll let you know when I'm ready.$9
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Hah.. No way Jose..$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I'm not getting married to some farmer who just moved here.

Entries.give_flowersA: Wow @, you're embarrasing me.$1#$b#Thank you so much!$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I feel you are the teammate I have always needed.#$b#Our wedding can't happen soon enough!$4
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: I am sure I still have the pendant you gave me.$1#$b#No way I'm fumbling that!$1
Entries.engageB: There is no trophy or medal more precious to me than the Pendant you gave me.$4

Entries.give_flowersA: They're wonderful!  You're such a good hubby to me.$1^They're wonderful!  Thank you for being such a caring wife.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: You're a dream, @.  Thank you so much.$4
Entries.marriedA: How did you find another one?$7
Entries.marriedB: I hope that's not for someone else.$2

Entries.give_flowersA: What a lovely gesture, @.$1#$b#You are quite the romantic, aren't you.$1#$b#May our courtship be prosperous for us both.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I have been thinking about you all day and night.#$b#Nothing would soothe my soul better than knowing you are for me as I for you.$4
Entries.give_pendant: So, our journey has led us here.#$b#...$1#$b#I shall miss the sea...$1#$b#Though I feel your farm will have a charm I could love as well.  Starting with you.$4#$b#I shall speak with Mayor Lewis about our celebration.  In three days time, our paths will be one.$4
Entries.stardrop_gift: A stardrop is a rare find, my precious @.$4#$b#And only someone as precious as you should receive a gift of this magnitude.$4#$b#This is for our love and our future.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: Appreciated, but rejected.
Entries.rejectNPCB: I'm not that desperate, don't assume that I would be so quick to pluck the flower of love.$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: They say that cultivating love is like gardening.#$b#It needs time and patience, my friend.#$b#We are not even sure what color the rose is yet.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartB: So quickly you jump to your feelings.#$b#It's a beautiful thing, @.  Though you must tame your wild heart, lest it accidentally jump off a cliff.
Entries.reject_four_heartA: My love for you is like a truck.$4#$b#It's best we obey the speed limit down the highway of the future
Entries.reject_four_heartB: You are an inferno of Passion and inspiration to me.#$b#I can have no friend greater than you.
Entries.engageA: Ahhh... the day finally came...$1#$b#But it is with heavy heart that I must remind you that you have been betrothed to another.
Entries.engageB: My heart cries in pain... seeing this pendant, knowing you belong to another.$2#$b#I shall brood extensively tonight and toast to your success.$2
Entries.marriedA: My sympathies go to %spouse...$2#$b#Who knew you were such a depraved soul.$2
Entries.marriedB: I am bound by my honor to refuse this.#$b#You belong to %spouse, and I will not intervene.
Entries.refusal_knownA: Why reach the next chapter when there are plenty of pages to read in this one.  Let's take our time.
Entries.refusal_knownB: Our love is maturing... Let's not pick that rose too early.
Entries.refusal_botherA: My... you are quite persistent aren't you.
Entries.refusal_botherB: I believe this calls for a poem..... *ahem*#$b#NO...$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Just learned of our tradition, eh?#$b#The tradition is to give that to someone you deeply love.  I'd hang on to that.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: You flatter me.#$b#This, however, is not the time to use that.

Entries.give_flowersA: Such a beautiful reprentation of my love.  I shall treasure this always.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: Such a lovely gesture, my love.#$b#We have so much to look foward to.
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: I have the pendant you proposed to me with.#$b#Such a thing is a well guarded treasure I can never release.
Entries.engageB: To have more of these pendants would cheapen the value of the first.$2

Entries.give_flowersA: Each flower reminds me of the wonderful man I call husband.$4^Each flower reminds me of the wonder wife I have.$4#$b#You inspire me to be my very best.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: Such beauty..$4#$b#Come closer, husband...$4^Come closer, darling wife.
Entries.marriedA: Where are these coming from?
Entries.marriedB: I can't believe it's not butter!

Entries.give_flowersA: What a lovely scent.  Are these for me?$1#$b#I don't have a lot of down time because of the clinic.  But, if you're willing, I'm willing to try.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: This is something I wasn't expecting.$1#$b#I would be more than happy to take our relationship to the next level.$1
Entries.give_pendant: !!...$7#$b#I a..admit.. I feel like I have a sense of vertigo right now...$7#$b#You make me feel as if I could fly, @.$4#$b#I should let Mayor Lewis know about our wedding.  It will take about three days to put together.$4
Entries.stardrop_gift: I kept this for a long time as a treasure.#$b#Now you're my treasure, so I thought you would accept this as a token of my love.$4#$b#Thank you for everything, @.
Entries.rejectNPCA: Oh... Well I'm not one to rush these sort of things.
Entries.rejectNPCB: ....Really?$5
Entries.reject_two_heartA: I'm not sure what to think about this.#$b#I mean.. I barely know you.$2
Entries.reject_two_heartB: You still haven't even come in for a check up.$5#$b#Why would you even try to date someone you don't know?$1
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I... feel a little dizzy.$2#$b#I am not feeling that it's the right time to be thinking about this.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: I appreciate your feelings, @.#$b#But I only see you as a great friend.$1
Entries.engageA: I'm pretty sure it's not a good thing to propose to someone after you proposed to someone.$1
Entries.engageB: I can't accept this.  You're taken already.$2
Entries.marriedA: You know, I talk to %spouse... I am the local doctor....$5
Entries.marriedB: I think %spouse deserves better than this.$5#$b#I think you're better than this...$2
Entries.refusal_knownA: I am enjoying our relationship right now.  No need to rush it.
Entries.refusal_knownB: We don't need to rush it. I don't want us making a mistake after all.$1
Entries.refusal_botherA: Why are you so bent on getting married so fast?
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: What's your angle.$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Do you need psychiatric care?$5

Entries.give_flowersA: The wedding is not to far off.$1#$b#How much more love do you want me to feel.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: It feels like I am a bird right now.$7#$b#A bit dizzy, but I am getting to like the feeling.$4
Entries.give_pendant: Where did you find this other pendant?#$b#I never let the one you gave me out of my sight.$1
Entries.engageA: You didn't bump your head in the mines did you?#$b#As if I would lose your pendant.$1
Entries.engageB: No need to have that extra one.  I still have the pendant.

Entries.give_flowersA: Are those for me?$4#$b#You've made me such a happy man.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: You are just what the doctor ordered.$4

Entries.marriedB: Huh?  Oh that's nice dear.$9

Entries.give_flowersB: I'm glad I took my allergy medicine today.$1#$b#These are nice... I guess I'm your boyfriend now.$4

Entries.marriedB: You're still married to %spouse... I can't imagine breaking someone's heart like that.$2

Entries.refusal_knownB: I don't think we should be reckless about this.  I want us to be perfectly happy.$7

Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I can't accept this right now.$2

Entries.give_flowersA: Wow!  I love you so much, @!$4#$b#%Sam sneezes uncontrollably
Entries.give_flowersB: Are you trying to kill my allergies by exposing me to them?$1#$b#I'm just kidding.  I appreciate you so much.$4

Entries.marriedB: If I'm saying this.. you're cheating items.

Entries.give_flowersA: I never expected anyone would give me flowers.#$b#You are something special aren't you.$1
Entries.give_flowersB: So you're looking to become closer to me?#$b#I feel the same way.$1#$b#It's good to know someone out there cares about me.$4

Entries.rejectNPCA: ...Get lost.$3

Entries.reject_two_heartA: Look, It's not like that with you.#$b#I don't even know you.
Entries.reject_two_heartB: I am far too busy to date anyone right now...
Entries.reject_four_heartA: You're a great guy and all...$2^You're a wonderful girl and all...$2#$b#I just don't think I am ready for that.
Entries.reject_four_heartB: I just want to be good friends, @.  That's all.$7
Entries.engageA: You're engaged... so this is a hard no...$6
Entries.engageB: You're joking right... I'm not playing along...$6
Entries.marriedA: You went through a lot to have %spouse 's affections... I'm not about to do something that breaks that bond.$6
Entries.marriedB: And here I thought you were different... You should treat your marriage like it's sacred.$6#$b#Mom dreamed of a good marriage and had to take two attempts to get it.$5
Entries.refusal_knownA: There's no reason to push for marriage.#$b$#We need to be sure this is the right choice.
Entries.refusal_knownB: I can dig moving fast here and there... but watching what mom went through, I think I'll hold off for now.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Don't be passing that around right now.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: You work fast don't you?$6

Entries.give_flowersB: You make me feel like I am your world.  I can't wait to live with you.$4

Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: How dare you... Kent would punch your lights out if he saw you try to give me this.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I am going to pretend you didn't do this...$2
Entries.engageA: It's not a nice to propose to others when you're engaged.$2
Entries.engageB: Are you trying to hurt the one you love or something?$4
Entries.marriedA: You're so scandalous.$1
Entries.marriedB: If Kent saw this, he'd rip you a new one.$4#$b#Then he'd tell %spouse about this.$4

Entries.rejectNPCA: ...$4#$e#%Clint is frozen... I don't think he knows what to do....
Entries.rejectNPCB: ...$4#$e#%Clint is frozen... I don't think he knows what to do....
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Duuhhhhhhhh$4#$b#%Clint cannot even say yes or no...
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Duuhhhhhhhh$4#$b#%Clint cannot even say yes or no...
Entries.engageA: Aren't you getting married?$2
Entries.engageB: What?$4
Entries.marriedA: Aren't you married to %spouse?
Entries.marriedB: I'm sure %spouse is at home being faithful to you.  You should do the same.$3

Entries.rejectNPCA: Oh dear, I can't accept these... I'm far too old.$1
Entries.rejectNPCB: You're a strange one...$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Hah!  That's funny!$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Oh... That's a beautiful pendant.  You should hold onto that for that special someone.
Entries.engageA: Where are you picking these up from?
Entries.engageB: I thought you gave your love this already.
Entries.marriedA: Oh dear, %spouse wouldn't want to see you do this.$2
Entries.marriedB: Why are you trying to give this away?$2

Entries.rejectNPCA: What are you getting at?!  Get that away from me.$3
Entries.rejectNPCB: What you got a thing for old people?
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: What is this?!  Go away with that stupid pendant!$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: This reminds me of when I gave Evelyn her pendant.#$b#Seems forever ago.#1
Entries.engageA: Why did you get two?
Entries.engageB: I'm not buying that if that's what you're asking.
Entries.marriedA: How dare you!$3
Entries.marriedB: I find this generation appalling.  Back in my day we knew how to respect our marriages.$3

Entries.rejectNPCA: How curious... What does this mean?
Entries.rejectNPCB: Is that for me to eat?
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Appreciated... however your kind is ugly to me.
Entries.engageA: I do not always understand your traditions...
Entries.engageB: I think the color is pretty
Entries.marriedA: What kind of creature made this?
Entries.marriedB: I don't think I understand...

Entries.rejectNPCA: Are you crazy?!  If Robin sees this she's going to kill me!  Put those away!!$6
Entries.rejectNPCB: I get that I am a handsome fellow, but I am taken.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Are you insane?!  Put that away!$6
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Put that away before Robin beats us both to a pulp!$6
Entries.engageA: This is a sacred symbol here... Don't pass that around lightly.$5
Entries.engageB: If I did this to Robin.. she would have turned me into furniture.$5#$b#Hmmm.. I think I'd make a fashionable desk at least.$3
Entries.marriedA: I feel offended by this.$4
Entries.marriedB: Get that out of here and don't let Robin catch you holding it.$4

Entries.rejectNPCA: HAHA.. you're not sweet-talking me into giving you free food.$1
Entries.rejectNPCB: No offense, but you're too young for me.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I'm not looking to get married anytime soon.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I think I'm fine as I am... thank you.$1
Entries.engageA: I'm pretty sure it's not a good idea to pass this around after you get engaged.
Entries.engageB: I wonder why you have a second pendant... that's a rare occurrence.
Entries.marriedA: I am sure %spouse would be hurt to see what you're doing.$3
Entries.marriedB: What are you thinking?  Go home and be a good spouse to %spouse.

Entries.rejectNPCA: Are you stupid?$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: I am happy in my marriage...
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: What?$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: What's your major malfunction?$2
Entries.engageA: Marriage is a sacred institution... don't disrepect it.
Entries.engageB: UCMJ would have a field day with you...
Entries.marriedA: I should knock some sense in your head for your spouse's sake.
Entries.marriedB: Don't do it... it's not worth it...

Entries.rejectNPCB: What is this about?
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Such a disgusting item....
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: How repulsive.. and you wear it around your neck?
Entries.engageA: I don't like it...
Entries.engageB: Get it away from me please...
Entries.marriedA: This thing... why is it here?
Entries.marriedB: I can't stand it... it's too ugly...

Entries.rejectNPCA: Sorry but I am not comfortable with this situation.$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: Ah, no thank you...#$b#Why don't you get sweet with the younger bunch.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I'm far too old for you...
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I have eyes elsewhere... besides I don't want the town thinking I pick favorites.
Entries.engageA: You know I am the one who run the wedding... I am sure you want to go without a hitch...$3
Entries.engageB: You don't have to give this to me... you should of given it to your spouse-to-be.$1
Entries.marriedA: I find this highly offensive.$4
Entries.marriedB: You married %spouse. You shouldn't be out doing this.!$4

Entries.rejectNPCA: I have no need for dating.  I rather live out here alone.
Entries.rejectNPCB: Thanks for the offer, but no thanks.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I'm not looking to get married.  Thanks for the offer.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Thanks but no thanks.
Entries.engageA: I don't feel comfortable with this.$2
Entries.engageB: You shouldn't be giving this to me.$2
Entries.marriedA: Aren't you married?$2
Entries.marriedB: I might not know %spouse that much.  But I am sure this is not something she wants in a marriage.$2

Entries.rejectNPCA: Huh?$4#$b#I'm sorry... but I'm not interested in you.$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: You're a good man.. but I'm not interested in that.$3^You're a good woman.. but I'm not into you.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I would love to get married... just not to you..$2
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Oh... well thanks.. but I need to say no.$1
Entries.engageA: This isn't something you should be doing.$2
Entries.engageB: I hope you're not expecting me to say yes.$3
Entries.marriedA: How cruel... %spouse doesn't deserve this.$3
Entries.marriedB: What are you getting at showing this to me.$2

Entries.rejectNPCA: ...I see no profit in this...$4
Entries.rejectNPCB: Did you buy this just to give it right back?!$4
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Why are you handing me this?$4
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: What kind of fool do you take me for?$4
Entries.engageA: I'm sure this would cause problems... let's not speak of this.$4
Entries.engageB: No no... you're doing it wrong... That goes to who you want to marry.$4
Entries.marriedA: Are you trying to use this place as a pawn shop?$4
Entries.marriedB: I am sure %spouse would be hurt if she knew what you were doing.$4

Entries.rejectNPCA: I appreciate the gesture... but I need to give it a hard pass.$1
Entries.rejectNPCB: If I went with you, it would be a hassle to go to work everyday.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: How nice... But I am not interested.  Thanks for the offer.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: You're cute for asking.  But I'm not looking for a husband.^You're cute for asking.  But I'm not looking for a wife.
Entries.engageA: Oh.. didn't you give this to who you're engaged to?  They should be wearing it already.
Entries.engageB: I'm sorry but I am not so scandalous.$2
Entries.marriedA: How did such a person like you get married?
Entries.marriedB: Proposing to someone and you're still married.#$b#I don't think you will hold a marriage for too long with that attitude.

Entries.rejectNPCA: I took my rod out of that pond ages ago... The sea is my lover.$1
Entries.rejectNPCB: Nothing can take my heart from the sea.#$b#I am hers forever.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: That's a valuable item.  Don't sell it.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Ahhh a Mermaid's Pendant.  Hold on to that for someone you truly love.$1
Entries.engageA: I don't feel comfortable with you doing this.$2
Entries.engageB: You're going to break someone's heart like that.$2
Entries.marriedA: Aren't you being a little greedy?$2
Entries.marriedB: You shouldn't be doing this.$2

Entries.rejectNPCA: Flowers?  How mundane....
Entries.rejectNPCB: I am not available for petty love interests.
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I am not doing that dance again...
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Ohhhh no.. I learned from my last mistake.
Entries.engageA: I have no interest in your mundane lives.
Entries.engageB: Unless you want me to melt that, get it away from me.
Entries.marriedA: What?  Trouble me not for such triffles
Entries.marriedB: I'm not interested..
